answers.answer: you really should see your dr. it could be any number of things causing this. yes, you could be low on protein and you could be anemic. only your dr. can find this out. i hope you feel better. remar

question: i've been getting dizzy spells on and off for about 3 weeks. also feeling weak and not sleeping properly. i'm not sure what it could be because i dont have any major health problems but i do have a family history of diabetes and i could be anemic as i'm a vegiterian and have been for 2 and a half years.any suggestions?
title: weakness
